data.client_settings: Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 8372, Version Hash: 29c99b734f8f085d618d514fde37392a3126cf79
data.actual_result: The old username appears, and the @ mention fails
data.expected_result: Either the username in the @ autofill should change, or it should not appear.
data.short_description: Using @ autofill lists old usernames of members that have changed their usernames
data.steps_to_repro: - Get two members in a server chat - Make one send a message - Using the one that sent a message, change its username - Using the second account and in the same channel the message was sent in, type @ - Old username appears and will fail to mention the person - Note: This is actually a problem of username not updating in chat history, problem is fixed with a client reboot. Makes it easier to test/repro if you treat it that way
